You can even use this adapter for any 2.5”/3.5” SATA SSD/HDD and it will run at screaming speed with UASP support. This Optical/Storage adapter is perfect for any bare SATA storage drives that you like to get it connected. This is a perfect tool for quick Plug and Play, hot-swapped between drives without opening your case, “NDN” (No Drivers Needed), and it works with common OS like Windows/OS X/Linux. name: USB 3.0 to 5.25"/3.5" Hard Drive Enclosure,SATA 5.25"/3.5" Aluminum Enclosure Design for CD-ROM, CD-RW, DVD-ROM, Combo Drive and DVD/RW Drive (ME-535U3)
short_description: Wide Compatibility: Supports CD-ROM, CD-RW, DVD-ROM, Combo Drive, DVD/RW Drive, and 3.5" hard drives, catering to various storage needs.
USB 3.0 Compliance: Fully compliant with Universal Serial Bus 3.0 Specification Revision 1.0 for fast and efficient data transfer.
High-Speed Operation: Offers USB Super-Speed (5Gbps), High-Speed (480Mbps), Full-Speed (12Mbps), and Low-Speed (1.5Mbps) operation, ensuring flexible performance.
SATA Compatibility: Automatically negotiates between SATA I (1.5Gbps) and SATA II (3.0Gbps) for optimal drive performance.
Status Monitoring: Equipped with LED indicators for power and HDD activity, providing clear visual updates.
Efficient Cooling System: Built-in 40mm super cooling fan prevents overheating, ensuring stability and prolonged device lifespan.
Plug and Play: No software installation required, allowing for quick and hassle-free setup.
product_description: This versatile external drive enclosure is designed to support a variety of storage devices, including CD-ROM, CD-RW, DVD-ROM, Combo Drive, DVD/RW, and 3.5" hard drives. It complies with the Universal Serial Bus 3.0 Specification Revision 1.0, ensuring fast and efficient data transfer with USB Super-Speed (5Gbps), High-Speed (480Mbps), Full-Speed (12Mbps), and Low-Speed (1.5Mbps) operation modes. The enclosure features auto-negotiation between SATA I (1.5Gbps) and SATA II (3.0Gbps), automatically adjusting to provide optimal performance depending on the connected drive. LED indicators for power and hard drive activity provide clear status updates, helping you monitor your device's operation at a glance. To keep your drives running cool, the enclosure is equipped with a 40mm super cooling fan, preventing overheating during extended use and ensuring long-term reliability. The plug-and-play design allows for effortless setup, eliminating the need for any software installation. Simply connect the device, and it's ready to use. Whether you're expanding your storage capacity or accessing data from various devices, this external drive enclosure offers reliable, high-speed performance and user-friendly features. Perfect for both personal and professional use, it combines convenience, cooling, and compatibility into one compact solution.

short_description: 【Ultra-Thin External CD/DVD Drive】With a thickness of only 0.63 inches and a lightweight, compact design, this USB CD Drive fits easily into a backpack, making it perfect for travel, office, or home use. It’s also the ideal companion for laptops and PCs, enabling effortless data backup, movie playback, and software installation.

【Extra-Long Cable, Plug & Play】This CD/DVD Burner comes with an extra-long 31.5-inch cable for flexible placement. No external power or drivers are required – just connect via its 2-in-1 USB-A/USB-C cable for CD/DVD read and write.

【High-Speed USB 3.0 Optical Drive】Delivers fast data transfer (up to 5Gbps,and backward compatible with USB 2.0) and smooth CD/DVD read/write performance. This usb dvd drive supports up to 8x DVD read/write speeds and up to 24x CD read/write speeds.

【Wide Compatibility】This external CD drive is compatible with Windows 11/10/8/7/Vista/XP/2000/98/SE/ME, Mac OS, and Linux systems. The usb external dvd drive for pc supports CD+/-R/RW, CD-ROM, DVD+/-R/RW, DVD+/-R DL, DVD-ROM, DVD-RAM, VCD, and SVCD formats. Please note that Blu-ray discs are not supported. Windows 11 requires the installation of a media player (e.g. VLC).

【Worry-Free Purchase】Our qoyeia dvd player for laptop undergo strict factory testing to ensure optimal condition. If your received drive fails to function properly for any reason, please feel free to contact us—we are committed to fully assisting in resolving any product issues. We offer up to 24 months of after-sales support.

【Things to Know Before You Buy】 ⚠ This cd reader requires connection to a laptop or desktop computer to operate. And Not compatible with Blu-ray, 4K discs, smartphones, TVs, PS4/PS5, Xbox, tablets, projectors, car stereos, or Chromebooks. ⚠ Due to Mac OS system limitations, the dvd drive icon will only appear after inserting a disc. To eject a disc, right-click the desktop icon and select “Eject,” or choose ‘File’ > “Eject” from the menu bar. ⚠ Desktop computer users should connect the external optical drive to the USB port on the back of the motherboard.

product_description: NexStar DX2 is the second generation of the popular DX Optical Enclosure. Like DX, this DX2 is designed to be solidly built enclosure to house a 5.25" Desktop Optical drive and convert into an external enclosure. Your internal 5.25” optical drive now becomes a portable USB 3.0 enclosure that fits and moves with your desktops or laptops. This enclosure supports faster read/write operation requires of the optical drive like Blu-Ray drive, CD and DVD. The aluminum case keeps the device cool and operating at optimum conditions. This second generation NexStar DX2 external 5.25" enclosure is the smart way to optimize and share your optical drive with all your system.
